name: Flux Kontext Image Editor Kie AI
description:
Tool for edit local images using text prompts with the Flux Kontext model, via the kie.ai API.
Pricing (as of November 2025): ~$0.025 per image.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

aspectRatio.description: Optional aspect ratio of the created image. Must be one of '21:9', '16:9', '4:3', '1:1', '3:4', '9:16' or None to preserve original. Defaults to None

input_image_path.description: Full local path to the input image to edit. Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp

prompt.description: The text prompt describing how to edit the image. Only English language is supported

filename.description: Optional base filename (without extension), defaults to None (uses task_id)

improve_prompt.description: Wether to enable automated prompt improvement (may increase processing time). Defaults to False

safetyTolerance.description: Optional moderation level, from 0 (strict) to 6 (permissive). Defaults to 6

enableTranslation.description: Optional, enables automatic translation of non-English prompts to English. Defaults to True

model.description: Optional model choice. Must be 'flux-kontext-pro' or 'flux-kontext-max'. Defaults to 'flux-kontext-pro'

outputFormat.description: Optional format for the created image(s), must be 'png' or 'jpeg'. Defaults to 'jpeg'.

saved_images_paths.description: List of local paths where the edited images were saved

status.description: The status of the operation, e.g., 'success' or error message

task_id.description: The ID of the editing task

temporary_image_urls.description: List of temporary image URLs from the API
